events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the shipping is very late. The tracking number hasn’t updated for several days, and I’m getting worried that my package might never arrive.
The system classified this case as a delivery delay based on the customer’s report about late shipping and outdated tracking information.
This case has been assigned to a delivery support specialist to assist with the shipping delay issue.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the delay with your order. I’m here to help you track it and find out what’s causing the issue.
Could you please confirm your order number and the tracking number you have so I can investigate the current status of your shipment?
Thank you for responding quickly. The order number is 123456789, and the tracking number is RX987654321. I haven’t seen any movement in the tracking details for the past week.
I have contacted the courier service to get an update. They confirmed there was an unexpected delay but your package is now prioritized and should arrive within 3 business days.
Thank you for the update and for escalating this. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving my order soon.
I’m glad I could assist. Your case is now marked as resolved since the delivery is back on track with the courier priority status.
Just following up to ensure you have received your order and that everything arrived in good condition.
The customer confirmed receipt of the package without issues; therefore, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
